channel.title: CVE Feed for MapsMarker.com e.U. -- Leaflet Maps Marker
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MapsMarker.com e.U. -- Leaflet Maps Marker

item.title: CVE-2024-38782|2024-07-23T16:11:01.852Z -- mapsmarker.com%20e.u. -- leaflet%20maps%20marker
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in MapsMarker.Com e.U. Leaflet Maps Marker allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Leaflet Maps Marker: from n/a through 3.12.9.

item.title: CVE-2024-38782|2024-07-21T21:13:35.392Z -- mapsmarker.com%20e.u. -- leaflet%20maps%20marker
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in MapsMarker.Com e.U. Leaflet Maps Marker allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Leaflet Maps Marker: from n/a through 3.12.9.
